Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Documentary papyrus
Description: Documentary papyrus. The initial heading leaves no room for doubt: this was a letter (Ptolémaios XXX), the word "epistole" also figures in line 3. Although we are ignorant of the subject of the letter, one can reasonably suppose that it was administrative and not personal (like the other letters found in the same cartonnage of a mummy).
